data.name: Advenclave
data.detailed_description:
Hi! I would like to first start by mentioning that this game is still in development. The aim is to have a working vertical slice demo complete prior to November 2022, however a full release is still a while away.
If you would like to keep up to date with the progress, please feel free to wishlist or follow our development logs on YouTube.
Thank you :)

After the attack on the Great Flying Library, you find yourself in the ruins of a long forgotten island, you will need to mingle with and defend the strange and unique locals from the evils that lurk hidden beneath the surface.
Will you help free the citizens of this island from not just the approaching scourge, but from themselves?

Features
  • Learn different spells to defend yourself with.
  • Explore randomly generated dungeons to unlock new classes and abilities.
  • Rebuild a civilization while interacting with multiple NPC's and build relationships with them.

data.short_description: After the attack on the Great Flying Library, you must unlock the mysteries behind the strange Grimoire you were entrusted. Uncover the secrets of the island you have found yourself on while defending the unique locals from the evils that lurk beneath the surface in this Sandbox Action-RPG.
